item.title: Dev_instruction
item.description: Image Images uses relative links to the local images folder (in the same level as the markdown file). A preceding exclamation point is needed. ![PNNL Campus](/BEM-for-PRM/basics/images/PNNL_campus.jpg) You can adjust the image size by using the css width and/or height to the link image. ![PNNL Campus](/BEM-for-PRM/basics/images/PNNL_campus.jpg?width=200px) And add CSS (border) to it ![PNNL Campus](/BEM-for-PRM/basics/images/PNNL_campus.jpg?width=200px&classes=border) Tips/Notes/Warnings Note A notice disclaimer
